page.title: 13Schools In The Area
page.content: In our area of study there are 2 schools both primary schools taking children from 5 to 11 years of age. They are situated within half a mile of each other.One is in Evenwood & the other in Ramshaw.The one in Evenwood is a Church of England school.It has 1 head teacher and 5 class teachers with appriximetly 140 children on roll The 2nd school in Ramshaw is a County school with 1 head teacher and 2 pemanant class teachers & a part-time teacher to allow the head teacher to do the administrative work.There are approximetly 50 children on roll at Ramshaw School.When the children are ready to transfer to a secondry education provision has to be made for them to be bused to the nearest comprehensive school which is at Staindrop some 5 miles away.
